action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:He's here. *Click anywhere on the screen or press spacebar to progress dialog*"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Ok...I'm coming in. Just give me another second."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Quit being so literal and give me a couple minutes!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:So,if I'm supposed to quit being so literal is a couple of minutes actually an hour or?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:What a goof,my goof,but definitely a goof. Same as it was 8 years ago... today!? I remember when we first started toying with the idea."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:So,that's my best bride impersonation. Was fun to do that,even though none of this is going to happen of course."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Wait,what do you mean 'none of it's ever going to happen'? I don't have any say in the thing? "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:I went to the temple last night and prayed over the waters. As I was praying the water lillies moved into an odd formation."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:As I looked closer I saw they had spelled out 'he is too weird'."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:While I am not incredibly supersitious, some signs just have to be heeded."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:That's pretty wild. I guess that closes that issue. Real quick though, wanted to tell you a fully unrelated story. Not sure if you knew, but my father was a powerful florist."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Powerful. Uncommon adjective for a florist. I'll allow it, go on. Just keep in mind I've met him like 6 times."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Well, he did flowering for years. Like a ton of years. Unfortunately, in his later years the flowering business got pretty tough."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:He was killed in a freak flower accident murder. The sick bastards left half cut red flowers on his pillow as a message."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Wait, cut roses would be a pretty standard condolence. I'm pretty sure it was just a standard flower 'sorry for your loss' kind of thing."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:That's what the cleric said too. Anyway, he had left me a note with only a few words on it. His dying words, which are of course well known to be the most true words one says, were: "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:'The water lillies are the lyingest of all flowers.' Deep stuff. Anyway, what were you saying?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:If anyone is listening out there,please help us keep our secret. Also,while I have you,why do they sell potion bottles in sets of 6 but they only sell you enough potion to fill 4? "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Better get to the house. Only building in town, other than the church, with a stain glass window. Classin it up as usual."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Bothius:Welcome sir. I have scouted the town of Heahill as you requested."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:The town of Heahill. It's people are weak and overwhelmed with distraction...We will fall on them like a bird on its prey. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Bothius:Yes sir! Their insolence will come to an end. We will fall on them like a thing with high mass falling on a thing with very little structural integrity!!!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:They will be like a flower that is so mesmerized by the feeding hummingbird that it cannot move for fear that it will disrupt perfection."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Bothius:Yeah! They will be like a thing that is significantly less potent and less fast! They will be so amazed by the other thing, which is us, that they will be in an awe inspired coma!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:Are you familiar with the concept of a simile?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Bothius:Of course sir. Simile is exactly like a metaphor. Better said, it is where you take the situation at hand and restate the exact same thing using difficult to understand words."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Bothius:It's like when you say something in a cave and the cave echoes it back. You could say that cave is 'metaphoring' you with a simile."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:So before, he was talking about himself."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:I think...I think he doesn't appreciate waiting."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Sorry! I'm nervous and I mean who refers to themselves in the third person? That shouldn't even be a thing."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Sorry about that. I wanted to give you time to settle in. Can I get you some tea?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Prag:No, that's alright. Call the child in now please."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Sweetheart, come in here. So what exactly are you going to do?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Prag:So I'll place the artifact on the table and we'll see if it reacts. I've never actually seen one do anything and I've done about a thousand of these."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Prag:Some people have said they have seen some cause it to emit a small luminescence, but I suspect that is wishful thinking. Magic is dead, if it ever existed at all."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Prag:Hello there boy. Will you play a quick game with me?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Prag:Whatever, I have 10 more of these to do this morning."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Prag:As usual...nothing. I'll be on my way. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:Actually it is, but he's really only gotten things started. Allow me. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:The mother as well? Cute. I'm taking the child...where is the child?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Sen how did you just? Where is? Drox, is that you over there? Where the heck did you come from?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Drox:Fiend, the purpose of strength is to show mercy; and yet to you it is its own end. Like a child you cannot see beyond the thing itself to its purpose. You are...limited."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "You know me? Interesting. No matter, if you are as powerful as you are pedantic then I've stumbled on true potential."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Balor: Is what one of you should have said...amateurs."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:Arrogance, how common. But three adepts in the same household, that's beyond coincidence. The father seems bewildered though, is he without powers? Improbable..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Honestly I am as surprised as you. I'm kind of just taking it all in. I mean, wow."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:Improbable...I detest surprises. I'll be back for the boy when the time is right."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:I also hate surprises, but lack the abiltiy to dematerialize. It takes a lot of the weight out of the announcement."

action.name: Add key
action.param: " Mallurian:So the prag guy looking for magic, something that is considered gone from the realm, comes by and not only does he find it but he finds...a lot. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Balor:I verify the accuracy of this story. Continue."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Then the hooded guy materializes and tries to take our son, I guess cause of the magic thing?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Drox:An astute summary. I wonder how you never picked up on the magic thing before."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:We see what we want to see I guess. This is overwhelming... whatever... wish I had magic."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Balor:HAHAHA! I'm laughing because what you said is painful! Painful because you don't have something that is awesome! HA! Good stuff."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "If Mal were here he'd tell you that's not the proper use of literally. He literally would."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Sen... I thought you were going to stop reading? I'm trying to sleep."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Then turn off the candelabra already."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: The candelabra?? What? Wait, I'm glowing... Not again..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: What? Snowing? That's not what I'm saying. Just please don't leave the candelabra burning again."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Right, hahaha. I'm gonna step outside and get some air. Sorry, honey, about the lamp. Definitely NOT sorry for a mystical glow that signifies the presence of potent latent magical powers. Forgive me... for the candelabra."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Woof, man, third time now. Yes, clearly nothing is going on but the candelabra. Please put it out."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Right right, out with you.. Er.. labra thing!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: I can't keep hiding this from him... he's going to figure out."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Well..even if he DOESN'T figure it out, I need to talk to him. I need to get some answers. Need to go see Sage Ralph at the church."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Wait...we don't even have a candelabra. I don't even think I've ever seen a candelabra."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: I guess I should talk to him... so nervous."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Sage Ralph, may I trouble your mind? There's something that's been really bothering me. I think I'm finally ready to talk about it..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sage Ralph: Yes my dear Sen. I believe I have foreseen this. You have come to speak to me about your new... abilities. You wish to hear the great tale of the past. The legend of magic."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Actually I wanted to ask... what's the deal with 'Ralph'? It's not really a very Sage-y name. Why not Merlin or Gandalf or Wizrobingston?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sage Ralph: Well, Sen, my parents chose my name, ok? I chose to be a sage. Hence, Sage Ralph. It's not alchemy, Sen; parents name children."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sage Ralph: I bet you think I'm going to say 'no I'm not telling it now'. But, nope, in my old age I have forsaken the shackles of shame. And so it begins..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Soldier 1:You agreed you'd be the one to do it. I was all for coming along and getting you to this point, but I have no interest in going up to that thing. I mean dragon statues AND pulsing red BLOOD ORBS?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Soldier 2: I know what I said and it's not a matter of fear. Arcane matters require some element of prudence, you know? I mean, no one really knows how magic came to exist. Tinkering with it isn't like smithing a blade, you oaf."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Soldier 3:All I know is that he's right.. you said you're doing it... I'm not going to talk to that... thing again."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Soldier 2:Again? You never really proved... never mind. I'm going already."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Soldier 3: Good. And I did too talk to it, before, and it was super brave. I would show you right now, but I'm still pretty tired from how brave I was..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood:: You didn't think I'd say hello? You think I'm so rude? Was it the lightning? Not all lightning users are rude, you know."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Soldier 2:No no, never mind. I heard that you could make us more powerful... than the others. Make us the greatest mages in the world."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood: Yes... you realize how open ended that promise is right? I mean, I'm obviously going to just drain the power from everyone else to accomplish that."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood: Hahahaha. How cute. I can feel your lie, your false outrage; it warms me. You did know and you don't even care. I can't tell if I like that more or less. You have the artifact?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood: No... no more waiting. Destiny is a matter of choice, not a thing to be waited for, and you already took the fork. Now it's time to eat."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sage Ralph: So you see child, they preferred to release an unspeakable evil upon the world; one which drained it of its wonder, just so they could have something they could control and lord over others."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Ralph... I mean, Sage Ralph. I'm sorry, I'm stressed of late. Please tell me about the legend of magic, seriously."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sage Ralph: don't yet know child. I don't yet know."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: I see. But... what's happening now? Why are we changing?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:said not to take my promiscuous red shoes off the carpet. While I disagree with his shoe assessment, I will honor his request."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:The church is straight east of here if I follow the road. I could walk around a bit. Not like it will be hard to find anything."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Glow is gone again. Figures. I guess I could just go back home...ugh. No I can't. Gotta see if he knows anything."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:I can't leave, I have to see what Sage Ralph Knows.""SenSide3"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Better not go there. Need to get to the church."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Lady:Yes, I am still out here at night time."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Hooded Guy:You seriously walk up to strangers in hoods and talk to them in the middle of the night? You are either really dumb or really powerful. Wait, you are glowing. The latter just tripled in probability."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Doe eyed warrior:Did I ever tell you what I think about night time? Like, night is just dayless day, ya know? Oh, you're married? Never mind then"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Very poignant repetition there. Very sagely."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Whoa… Weird. I guess the glow is back. Almost like it knew I needed it again."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sage Ralph: I went to sage school you know? They respected me there."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: Oh hey Lucca. It's me Cressa."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: My dad said I shouldn't really hang around you. Do you think I should hang around you?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: Sorry Lucca, I forgot you can't really talk. That's ok, I like to talk. My dad says most girls like to talk. He tells mom that a lot. He doesn't talk very much but he says that a lot."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: I love ponds Lucca. I love how the lilly pads just float on the pond and if the frogs need to take a break the lilly pads keep on floating and help the frogs out all the while. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: The frogs are kind too though. They never just sit on the lilly pads forever for no reason or make the lilly pads sew clothes to sell or make them wash their frog warts. They just rest a while with them, warts and all, and the lillipads just hold them."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: Lucca, don't you see? You're my quiet lilly pad and I'm your frog. Hahaha! RIBBIT! Look at my frog warts! EWWW!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa: LUCCA?!?! How did you do this!! You're amazing!!!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood : Lucca, I need you to come with me... calmly. I'd try and take you but you might accidentally cause a serious problem. Will you come?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Dark Hood : I figured. No one ever goes on the first ask do they? Not in the stories, not in real life. I'll be back in time, but first I'm going to leave you and your friend here with something that will make you wish you had come along. Remember, what I can do, I can undo... bye."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa's Dad: Cressa! What are you doing up here? Er... hey Lucca. Cressa what did I tell you?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa's Dad: Cressa? Answer me... what's happened to you?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa's Dad: You... you did this. You're not just a freak you're a contagious freak! Curse you..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa's Dad: And now she can't help me sell anything in my shop or run errands. She hasn't spoken since she was with your boy at the pond. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: I understand that, but correlation does not equal causation."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Well, what I meant is. You're an idiot."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa's Dad: You think just cause you can say words I don't understand you are better than me? Please Mal, I know what you were, what you are. And what use is Cressa to me now? She was barely useful before."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: What... use? If I were this person you so glibly insinuate I am I'd run you through; but I have the moral high ground right now and I kind of like it. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: After all, usefulness is not what makes us human, what makes us better or good. Not every person, let alone a child, is meant to contribute to the Gross Kingdom Product."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Cressa's Dad: Yeah, maybe not, but those are just pretty words. You think you're so charitable, so good? Well here's some words we both know: take her. Let's see how you deal with a second silent mouth to feed."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Yes, a thousand times yes. Now get out of my house."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: You forgot the second part of what she said. Leave the girl and get out."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: It's alright love. You are safe and welcome here."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Sen, you know what this means. I thought we'd be able to make it through the winter via proper means but at this rate we'll have to see what we can... acquire."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: I thought you were done with 'acquisitions'."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: I know,and I am. But... what I'm saying is... I'm not."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Sigh... Lucca, I need you and Cressa to stay with Uncle Drox and Balor for a bit. Alright, Mal, to the caves we go."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Aviator: Lady Callous, I present you with the new recruits. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Recruit: I lost my eye in that last skirmish, but I made it out. They let me use one of your old patches to protect it."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous: Good, I'm glad you made it out. You will have to be extra careful now as you have a blind side that can leave you exposed."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous: Why, I taught you to parry, but you chose to faint. Now my blade is a brush and your blood is the paint. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Hench1: Good one Lady Callous, hold on hold on. Ok... THEY MAKE GRAB, I MAKE STAB, NOW THEIR FUTURE IS DRAB. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous: ahem, as I was saying: The male lion sleeps all day, but the hyena... her eyes light the darkness of the jungle night. Now back to it boys. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Mal, be careful, it's been years since you went rogue. You could pull out your back."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: I dunno Sen, with a confidence shot in the arm of that magnitude it's bound to be a success! It doesn't matter anyway, we need this."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: No, maybe we don't. I wasn't sure if I told you, there are other options. I may have some new... ways."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA, still funny, ok, listen. I need you to go around the back and lookout for me. Just watch and make sure no reinforcements are coming back."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: I'll go in and pose as one of the newer members of the group. Whenever I get a chance I'll be snatching up gold bars until I have the full 99."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian: Right, remember the time you tried to buy another healing potion when you had 99 already?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: Yeah, I should've drank one before shopping in there. Head wasn't on right."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen: I'd better get closer in case he needs my help."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous: Wait, some gold is missing, and you on the left!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous:Who are you? I don't remember you being a recruit, but you are familiar."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mallurian:Who I am is not as important as who I am not. And who I am not is an impostor who came here and stole your gold. To clarify again: I am an impostor who stole your gold... wait."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:MAL! GET OUT OF THERE ALREADY! LUMEN!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous:That was... Mallurian. My my, I was worried I would never get another chance to kill him. Maybe I'll have to become an optimist now? Heahill... that's the only town close enough..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Callous:Aviator, make preparations we're going on a field trip."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mom: Lucca, remember when I said that if our rage controls us we relinquish all power to the one who provokes us?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Mom: Also you didn't drink your green potion. It tastes just like the blue potion and you like the blue potion! You can't just drink ONE type of potion your whole life Lucca!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Silver Dude:I can't stop walking even though I desperately want to. It's like I'm stuck in an endless cycle..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Retired curmudgeon:Your house is the one in the southwest of town, in case for some weird reason you forgot. Of course you should walk around town if you want. Or do whatever, nobody listens to me anyway."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Overly Secretive Lady:Don't tell anyone but, I'm pretty sure this is the best spot in town for aimless wandering. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Lady:Hey Sen, good luck with the test. The prag's already gone through everyone else's house, so far he hasn't found a thing."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Literal Linda:Sen! Oh my goodness he almost found some of our artifacts! I'm SO RELIEVED our turn is done! I think if it were our turn now I would DIE. SEN, I WOULD LITERALLY DIE."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Subtle Sam:Come back another time when the imperials are not here. I have stuff to sell. The kind of stuff a hooded guy in a hidden grove sells..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Unattended Annie:Everyone seems so skittish. My mom uses that word a lot so I say it all the time. Using it makes me feel skittish!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Fearful Phil:The forest to the west is filled with weird stuff. I went out there once, quiet and boring. It made me uncomfortable. Better to stay in town with us magical folk."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Spastic Spence:I'm going to ditch town soon. All this imperial attention stresses me out."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Hanna:Hey Sen, don't you need to get home? I think I saw your brothers in law around town by the way."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Marle:Sen...my prayers are with your family. Stay vigilant!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Impudent Ivan:I personally hope the prags and the imperials learn of our town secret. Then the real adventure can begin!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Profound Perry:I am locked in a deep staring contest with that tree to the south. Get out of the way..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Nervous Nelly:We are going to be discovered. The time for action against the imperials is nigh; or near... depending on how 'epic' you are feeling."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Actual Owner of treasure:What... what do you think you are doing? Are you in the habit of just walking into people's houses and taking things?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Actually this is the first time someone's said anything. It hadn't even occurred to me it was an issue."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Actual Owner of treasure:Well young person. It is. The world is falling apart. Please leave"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Odd that never occurred to me before."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Blacksmith:Can I interest you in Iron Armor? 100G! Or Gold Armor? 1000G! Or, perhaps, DIAMOND ARMOR!! 100000G!!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:You seem to have an exponential thing going on with your pricing scheme... Don't you think you should narrow in on a single demographic?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:You have 3 items for sale each of which appeal to an entirely different group of customers. I mean if you get lucky enough to sell some Iron Armor it's extremely unlikely that same person would buy an item 10x its price... or 1000x its price."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Blacksmith:All these years... I thought it was my personality. This changes everything."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Legitimate Larry:Come back another time, we are having a super secret sale. This is definitely not a front for some other illegitimate business. HAHA! No sirree!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Silver Dude:I can't stop walking even though I desperately want to. It's like I'm stuck in an endless cycle..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Retired curmudgeon:Your house is the one in the southwest of town, in case for some weird reason you forgot. Of course you should walk around town if you want. Or do whatever, nobody listens to me anyway."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Overly Secretive Lady:Don't tell anyone but, I'm pretty sure this is the best spot in town for aimless wandering. "

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Lady : Hey Lucca. Yeah I have nothing of value to say."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Literal Linda:Lucca! You are LITERALLY the cutest. If an actual objective contest was held worldwide you would win. LITERALLY."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Subtle Sam:Come back another time when the imperials are not here. I have stuff to sell. The kind of stuff a hooded guy in a hidden grove sells..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Unattended Annie : I wish my parents would watch me closer, I feel so lonely. HAHA! Just kidding! SWEET FREEDOM!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Fearful Phil:The forest to the west is filled with weird stuff. I went out there once, quiet and boring. It made me uncomfortable. Better to stay in town with us magical folk."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Spastic Spence:I'm going to ditch town soon. All this imperial attention stresses me out."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Hanna: Hey Lucca, your uncle Balor is cute. DON'T TELL HIM I SAID THAT. Unless you want to..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Marle:Sen...my prayers are with your family. Stay vigilant!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Impudent Ivan:I personally hope the prags and the imperials learn of our town secret. Then the real adventure can begin!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Profound Perry:I am locked in a deep staring contest with that tree to the south. Get out of the way..."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Nervous Nelly : I like turtles. I dunno, ahh!"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Actual Owner of treasure:What... what do you think you are doing? Are you in the habit of just walking into people's houses and taking things?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Actually this is the first time someone's said anything. It hadn't even occurred to me it was an issue."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Actual Owner of treasure:Well young person. It is. The world is falling apart. Please leave"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:Odd that never occurred to me before."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Blacksmith : Lucca, you can't wear armor yet. You are too young and you probably would wear cloth armor anyway. Wizard robes look like pajamas to me, I'm just sayin."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:You seem to have an exponential thing going on with your pricing scheme... Don't you think you should narrow in on a single demographic?"

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Sen:You have 3 items for sale each of which appeal to an entirely different group of customers. I mean if you get lucky enough to sell some Iron Armor it's extremely unlikely that same person would buy an item 10x its price... or 1000x its price."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Blacksmith:All these years... I thought it was my personality. This changes everything."

action.name: Add key
action.param: "Legitimate Larry:Come back another time, we are having a super secret sale. This is definitely not a front for some other illegitimate business. HAHA! No sirree!"

variable.comment: made -1 cause dictionary returns 0 and only want to check for that
variable.name: check
